sql-statements.statement: App::Statements::Transaction

select t.caption as name ,t.detail as description ,t.code as proc_code,ta.value_text as cpt_code , ta.item_id as item_id , ta.value_textB as modifier FROM transaction t, trans_attribute ta WHERE t.trans_id = :1 and trans_status=2 and ta.parent_id (+) = t.trans_id and rownum <5 order by ta.item_id asc
select * from transaction where data_text_b = ? and trans_owner_id = ?
SELECT * FROM trans_attribute WHERE parent_id = ? AND item_name = ?
select * from transaction where parent_trans_id = ?
select * from transaction where trans_id = ?
SELECT value_int FROM trans_attribute WHERE parent_id = ?
select caption from trans_related_to where id = ?
SELECT trans_id FROM transaction WHERE trans_owner_id = ? AND trans_type = 8020 AND caption = 'Deceased Patient'
SELECT rfs.caption FROM REFERRAL_FOLLOWUP_STATUS rfs, transaction t WHERE t.parent_trans_id = :1 AND t.trans_status_reason = rfs.id
SELECT id, caption FROM intake_client ORDER BY caption
SELECT id, caption FROM intake_detail ORDER BY caption
SELECT id, caption FROM intake_service ORDER BY caption
select count(*) from transaction where trans_type between 12000 and 12999 and trans_owner_id = ? and data_text_b = ?
select distinct code FROM transaction WHERE code = :1 and trans_type = 4000 and trans_subtype = 'Misc Procedure Code' and trans_status = 2

select t.caption as name ,t.detail as description ,t.code as proc_code, ta.value_text as cpt_code1,ta.item_id as item_id1, ta.value_textB modifier1, ta.value_int as nextId, t.trans_id as trans_id from Transaction t, trans_attribute ta where trans_status = 2 and ta.parent_id = t.trans_id and ta.item_id = :1
select code FROM transaction t WHERE trans_id = :1
select t.caption as name ,t.detail as description ,t.code as proc_code from transaction t where trans_status = 2 and t.trans_id = :1

select trans_owner_id, trans_id,trans_type,trans_begin_stamp, related_data, caption, trans_status_reason, provider_id, data_text_a, data_text_b, data_text_c, consult_id, detail, complete_name from transaction, person where trans_type between 11000 and 11999 and ( provider_id = ? or provider_id in (select value_text from person_attribute where parent_id = ? and parent_org_id = ? and item_name = 'Association/Resource/Physician') ) and trans_status = 2 and person_id = trans_owner_id
select max(value_int)+1 FROM trans_attribute ta where ta.parent_id = ? and trans_stauts = 2

select trans_id, trans_type, transaction.caption, transaction.code, transaction.modifier, trans_owner_id, pkg_entity.GetEntityDisplay(INITIATOR_TYPE, INITIATOR_ID) as initiator, pkg_entity.GetEntityDisplay(RECEIVER_TYPE, RECEIVER_ID) as receiver, pkg_entity.GetEntityDisplay(0, PROVIDER_ID) as provider, pkg_entity.GetEntityDisplay(0, CARE_PROVIDER_ID) as care_provider, pkg_entity.GetEntityDisplay(1, SERVICE_FACILITY_ID) as service_facility, TRANS_BEGIN_STAMP, to_char(TRANS_BEGIN_STAMP, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as TRANS_BEGIN_STAMP_FORMAT, TRANS_END_STAMP, tt.caption as type_name, GROUP_NAME, ICON_IMG_SUMM, invoice_id, ref_cpt.name as cpt_caption, ref_icd.description as icd_caption from transaction, transaction_type tt, invoice, offering_catalog_entry ref_cpt, offering_catalog_entry ref_icd where PARENT_TRANS_ID = ? and TRANS_TYPE = ID and TRANS_OWNER_TYPE = 0 and TRANS_OWNER_ID = ? and trans_id = invoice.main_transaction (+) and transaction.code = ref_cpt.code (+) and transaction.code = ref_icd.code (+) order by TRANS_BEGIN_STAMP DESC, GROUP_NAME, tt.CAPTION

select trans_id, trans_type, transaction.caption, transaction.code, transaction.modifier, trans_owner_id,transaction.data_text_a,transaction.data_text_b, pkg_entity.GetEntityDisplay(INITIATOR_TYPE, INITIATOR_ID) as initiator, pkg_entity.GetEntityDisplay(RECEIVER_TYPE, RECEIVER_ID) as receiver, pkg_entity.GetEntityDisplay(0, PROVIDER_ID) as provider, pkg_entity.GetEntityDisplay(0, CARE_PROVIDER_ID) as care_provider, pkg_entity.GetEntityDisplay(1, SERVICE_FACILITY_ID) as service_facility, TRANS_BEGIN_STAMP, to_char(TRANS_BEGIN_STAMP, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as TRANS_BEGIN_STAMP_FORMAT, TRANS_END_STAMP, tt.caption as type_name, GROUP_NAME, ICON_IMG_SUMM, invoice_id, ref_cpt.name as cpt_caption, ref_icd.description as icd_caption from transaction, transaction_type tt, invoice, offering_catalog_entry ref_cpt, offering_catalog_entry ref_icd where PARENT_TRANS_ID is null and TRANS_TYPE = ID and TRANS_OWNER_TYPE = 0 and TRANS_OWNER_ID = ? and trans_id = invoice.main_transaction (+) and transaction.code = ref_cpt.code (+) and transaction.code = ref_icd.code (+) order by TRANS_BEGIN_STAMP DESC, GROUP_NAME, tt.CAPTION

select trans_id,trans_type,trans_begin_stamp, related_data, caption, trans_status_reason, provider_id, data_text_a, data_text_b, data_text_c, consult_id, detail from transaction where trans_type between 11000 and 11999 and trans_owner_id = ? and trans_status = ?

select trans_id,trans_type,cr_stamp,trans_begin_stamp,data_text_a,data_text_b from transaction t where trans_begin_stamp = (select max(trans_begin_stamp) from transaction tt where t.data_text_b = tt.data_text_b and tt.trans_type between 12000 and 12999 and tt.trans_owner_id = ? group by tt.data_text_b)
SELECT id, caption FROM referral_followup_status ORDER BY caption

SELECT trans_id, trans_owner_type, trans_owner_id, parent_event_id, parent_trans_id, trans_type, trans_subtype, trans_status, caption, detail, code, billing_facility_id, service_facility_id, provider_id, care_provider_id, consult_id, initiator_id, receiver_type, receiver_id, processor_id, trans_seq, bill_type, related_to, data_text_a, data_text_b, data_text_c, data_num_a, data_num_b, data_num_c, to_char(data_date_a, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') AS data_date_a, to_char(data_date_b, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') AS data_date_b, trans_status_reason, related_data, caption, trans_substatus_reason, modifier,unit_cost,quantity, to_char(trans_begin_stamp, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') AS trans_begin_stamp, to_char(trans_end_stamp, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') AS trans_end_stamp FROM transaction t WHERE t.parent_trans_id = :1 AND t.trans_type = 6010 ORDER BY trans_id asc
SELECT id, caption FROM referral_result ORDER BY caption
SELECT id, caption FROM referral_service_descr ORDER BY caption
SELECT name FROM ref_service_category WHERE serv_category = ?
SELECT id, caption FROM referral_source_type ORDER BY caption
SELECT distinct serv_category,name FROM ref_service_category ORDER BY name
SELECT id, caption FROM referral_unit_type ORDER BY caption
DELETE FROM trans_attribute WHERE parent_id = ?
DELETE FROM transaction WHERE parent_trans_id = ? AND trans_type = 6010

SELECT trans_id, trans_owner_type, trans_owner_id, parent_event_id, parent_trans_id, trans_type, trans_subtype, trans_status, caption, detail, code, billing_facility_id, service_facility_id, provider_id, care_provider_id, consult_id, initiator_id, receiver_type, receiver_id, processor_id, trans_seq, bill_type, related_to, data_text_a, data_text_b, data_text_c, data_num_a, data_num_b, data_num_c, to_char(data_date_a, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') AS data_date_a, to_char(data_date_b, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') AS data_date_b, trans_status_reason, related_data, caption, trans_substatus_reason, modifier,unit_cost,quantity,trans_expire_reason FROM transaction t WHERE t.parent_trans_id = :1 AND t.trans_type = 6030 ORDER BY trans_id asc

SELECT trans_id, trans_owner_type, trans_owner_id, parent_event_id, parent_trans_id, trans_type, trans_subtype, trans_status, caption, detail, code, billing_facility_id, service_facility_id, provider_id, care_provider_id, consult_id, initiator_id, receiver_type, receiver_id, processor_id, trans_seq, bill_type, related_to, data_text_a, data_text_b, data_text_c, data_num_a, data_num_b, data_num_c, to_char(data_date_a, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') AS data_date_a, to_char(data_date_b, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') AS data_date_b, trans_status_reason, related_data, caption, trans_substatus_reason, modifier,unit_cost,quantity, trans_expire_reason FROM transaction t WHERE t.trans_id = :1 AND t.trans_type = 6030 ORDER BY trans_id asc
SELECT * FROM transaction t WHERE trans_id = ( SELECT MAX(trans_id) FROM transaction tt WHERE tt.trans_type = 6000 AND tt.consult_id = ? )
SELECT r.caption FROM referral_source_type r, transaction t WHERE t.trans_id = ? AND t.caption= r.id
select trans_id, trans_type, data_text_a, data_text_b, trans_begin_stamp from transaction where trans_type between 12000 and 12999 and trans_owner_id = ?
SELECT * FROM trans_address WHERE parent_id = ? AND address_name = ?
select code, curr_onset_date, trans_id, trans_type, r.name as icdname from transaction, ref_icd r where trans_id = ? and r.icd = code

select trans_id, trans_type, caption as subject, provider_id, care_provider_id, parent_event_id, to_char(trans_begin_stamp, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') as trans_begin_stamp, service_facility_id, billing_facility_id, bill_type, data_text_a as ref_id, data_text_b as comments from transaction where trans_id = ?
select trans_id from transaction where parent_event_id = ?

select provider_id, rel.caption as related_to, data_text_a as ref_id, billing_facility_id, service_facility_id from transaction, trans_related_to rel where trans_id = ? and transaction.related_to = rel.id
select * from transaction where data_num_a = ?

select trans_id, trans_owner_type, trans_owner_id, parent_event_id, parent_trans_id, trans_type, trans_subtype, trans_status, caption, detail, code, billing_facility_id, service_facility_id, provider_id, care_provider_id, consult_id, initiator_id, receiver_type, receiver_id, processor_id, trans_seq, bill_type, related_to, data_text_a, data_text_b, data_text_c, data_num_a, data_num_b, data_num_c, to_char(trans_begin_stamp, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') AS trans_begin_stamp, to_char(trans_end_stamp, 'MM/DD/YYYY HH12:MI AM') AS trans_end_stamp, to_char(init_onset_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS init_onset_date, to_char(curr_onset_date, 'MM/DD/YYYY') AS curr_onset_date, trans_status_reason, related_data, caption, trans_substatus_reason, auth_ref from Transaction where trans_id = ?
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE data_num_a = ? AND trans_owner_id = ?
UPDATE transaction SET trans_substatus_reason = 'Assigned' WHERE trans_id = ? AND trans_substatus_reason = 'Unassigned'
UPDATE transaction SET auth_ref = ?, consult_id = ? WHERE parent_trans_id = ?
update transaction set trans_status = 3 where parent_trans_id = ?
select id, caption from transaction_type where id>=2040 and id<3000
